articles.author: Meredith Deliso, ABC News
articles.title: Gene Hackman's dog likely died of starvation and dehydration, necropsy report finds - ABC7 Los Angeles
articles.description: The dog, an Australian kelpie mix named Zinfandel, was found dead in a crate near the body of Gene Hackman's wife.
articles.content: The dog belonging to actor Gene Hackman and his wife Betsy Arakawa that was found dead along with the couple in their New Mexico home last month likely died of dehydration and starvation, according t… [+2306 chars]
